string.value: #b#p9010014##k in #b#m100000200##k has lost the books she collected for the Great Maple Book Drive.
#p9010014#, has asked me to help her find #b#t4000515##k . She says set off a beautiful #bfireworks display#k if I help her.
#p9010014#, has asked me to help her find #b#t4000515##k . She says set off a beautiful #bfireworks display#k if I help her.

Hiya! I'm #p9010014#. I love to make firecrackers, but I'm back in school now. I had a bunch of books ready for my school's book drive, but monsters stole them. Will you, #h0#, help retrieve #b#t4000515##k? If you do, I'll decorate the sky above #b#m100000000# Park#k with pretty fireworks.
Whenever I get enough of #t4000515# back, I'll thank you with a display of my fireworks. I'll announce the fireworks before I set them off, so come by when you see the announcement. See you there!
